relationships.description: 夏空彼方 is a title or entry in 萌娘百科
夏空彼方 is also known as 夏空カナタ
夏空彼方 is rated for viewers aged 18 and above by EOCS
夏空彼方 was developed by YUZU SOFT
夏空彼方 was scripted by 天宫リツ
夏空彼方 was scripted by 玉泽圆
Summer Skies' music was composed by Famishin
Summer Skies' music was composed by Angel Note
The story of 夏空彼方 takes place on 塔弦岛
Summer Skies features 三好由比子 as one of the main characters
Summer Skies features 六角五郎 as one of the main characters
Summer Skies features 上坂茅羽耶 as one of the main characters
Summer Skies features 七条沙沙罗 as one of the main characters
Summer Skies features 三好双叶 as one of the secondary characters
Summer Skies features 三好美帆 as one of the secondary characters
Summer Skies features 仁木夕张 as one of the secondary characters
Summer Skies features 足利贞道 as one of the secondary characters
Summer Skies features 七条克己 as one of the secondary characters
Summer Skies features 上坂昭彦 as one of the secondary characters
Summer Skies features 羽柴昌平 as one of the secondary characters
Summer Skies features 京极史绪 as one of the secondary characters
The theme song 思念的彼方 was composed by Angel Note
The ending song Refrain was composed by Famishin
